projectGridLines.title: Title: Determining the market fit of a category and maximizing potential
projectGridLines.description:
• Title: Determining the market fit of a category and maximizing potential
  • Description: Identifying ways to evaluate the effectiveness of a category based on customer needs, state and occasion.
  • Skill sets: 
  • Business Knowledge (Marketing e-commerce or D2C industry)
  • Strong familiarity with programming languages, including Python and others, is highly valued but not a prerequisite for this role
  • Ability to work with query language (SQL)
  • Proficiency in Excel
  • Analytical Skills
  • Problem Solving
  • Good Communication Skills
  • Expected learning:  By completing this project, you will gain a comprehensive understanding of category management in the D2C industry and identify the category levers for business growth.
  • Specific courses required for project execution:  
  • Database courses
  • Marketing/Business Management courses
